svg.title: IR-12: Intelligent Review Feedback Loop Orchestrator
svg.desc: Complex workflow orchestration system coordinating feedback loops between human reviewers, AI analysis, and automated systems to transform review bottlenecks into learning acceleration through intelligent routing, quality scoring, and continuous optimization.
svg.text: Complex workflow orchestration transforming review bottlenecks into learning acceleration systems
30-second AI analysis handling routine issues before human review
ğŸ§ Intelligence Layer - AI-Powered Review Orchestration
Context analysis, intelligent routing, and learning opportunity identification
ğŸ‘¥ Human Amplification Layer - Expert Review Acceleration
Context-enhanced reviews focusing human expertise on architecture and learning
Machine learning enhancement and adaptive process improvement
